revision.comment: /* top */clean up, replaced: hynix → SK hynix (2), SK SK hynix → SK hynix (2)
revision.text:
{{Infobox Embedded System |image1 = <!-- Image filename --> |image1_size = <!-- Image size, ex.150px --> |caption = Single-board Computer |caption2 = <!-- 2nd tagleine --> |pp = http://www.cubietech.com/product-detail/cubieboard5/ |sp = <!-- Support page url only --> |dl = <!-- Download page url only --> |wikidevi = Cubietech_Cubieboard_5 |wikipedia = <!-- [[wikipedia:Main Page|Wikipedia]] Leave blank for none --> |ddwrtsupport = <!-- Activation, Donation, Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, TBD, Unofficially, WIP --> |openwrtsupport = <!-- Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, WIP, Unofficially, --> |tomatosupport = <!-- Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, WIP, Unofficially, --> |gargoylesupport = <!-- Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, WIP, Unofficially, -->
|brand = Cubietech |model = Cubieboard |submodelappend = <!-- yes, for space --> |submodel = <!-- SubModel number, Leave blank for unknown --> |revision = 5 |subrevision = V1.1 150925 |model_part_num = |page_start_date = |page_start_origon = |wlclass = AN300 |series = <!-- Device series --> |type = single-board computer |sernum = <!-- First 4 or so for easy version identification --> |fcc_id = <!-- Federal Communication Commission Identification Number --> |icid = <!-- Industry Canada Identification number, Leave blank for unknown --> |us_id = <!-- US ID number --> |boardid = <!-- Board Identification, Leave blank for none --> |ecc_id = <!-- eec-id -->
|cpu1chip1 = Allwinner;H8; |cpu1_cores = 8 |cpu1_type = ARM |cpu1_type_rev = Cortex-A7 (v7-A) |cpu1spd = 2.0 GHz <!-- 2.0 GHz --> |is_doc = |bus = <!-- 8-bit, 16-bit, 32-bit, 64-bit, Leave blank for none -->
|flash1type = <!-- Parallel,Serial(SPI),SPI NOR,NAND,Compact Flash, --> |fla1_num = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |fla1chip = SK hynix;H26M41103HPR; |flash1size = 8 GiB |flash1maxsize = <!-- Maximum size firmware can be in bytes -->
|ram1type = <!-- DDR,DDR2,DDR3,DDR4, --> |ram1type1 = <!-- SO-DIMM,SDRAM, --> |ram1spd = <!-- RAM speed --> |ram1size = 2 GiB |ram1chip = SK hynix;H5TQ4G83AFR-PBC; |ram1_num = 4 |nvramsize = <!-- 32, 60, 64, etc... in kb, Leave blank for unknown -->
|eth_cpu = true |eth2chip = Realtek;RTL8211E; |lan_ports = 1 |lan_speed = 1GbE |ethstandard = <!-- auto --> |auto_mdix = <!-- mdix support --> |sup_jumbo = <!-- Jumbo frames support --> |ethoui = 12:13:58 |oui = CC:B8:A8
|bootwait = <!-- On or Off, Leave blank for unknown --> |stockbootloader = U-Boot;2011.09;rc1-00019-g1059e22; |stockos = Linux;3.4.39;Linaro 14.04;
|exp_if_types = USB 2.0, SATA 2, Micro SD Card slot |exp_usb_num = 3 |exp_sdmmc_num = 1 |exp_sata_num = 1 |usb_hub = <!-- USB hub compatibility -->
|pwr_volt_type = VDC |pwr_vdc = 5 |pwr_amp_dc = 3 |pwr_conn = barrel |pwr_barrel_outer = 1.7 |pwr_barrel_inner = <!-- Inner barrel size in mm --> |pwr_barrel_len = 4 |pwr_pol = <!-- Connector polarity -->
|serial = yes,, 3.3V TTL,, 4-pin header,, populated,, (115200 8N1),, |jtag = <!-- Full JTAG info -->
|specialfeat = <!-- Features that don't fit any place else, Leave blank for none --> |flags = HDMI 1.4, DisplayPort, SPDIF, microphone, Audio In/Out (3.5mm), IR receiver, Li-ion battery, Bluetooth 4.0, RTC w/ battery backup, |addchip = PMIC;X-Powers Limited;AXP818;;1;,,, Integrated USB 2.0-compatible 3-port hub;SMSC;USB3503;;1;,,, USB 2.0 to SATA Bridge Controller;Genesys Logic;GL830;;1;,,, MIPI DSI to DisplayPort Bridge;Toshiba;TC358777 XBG;;1;,,, 30V P-Channel MOSFET;Alpha & Omega;AO4435;;2;,,, |802dot11_protocols = abgn
|defaulip = <!-- ???.???.???.???, default IP Address --> |defaultlogin = <!-- default Login Name, Leave blank for unknown --> |defaultpass = <!-- default Password, Leave blank for unknown --> |defaultssid = <!-- default Wireless ID, Leave blank for unknown --> |defaultssid_regex = |default_ch = <!-- Defaults channel(s) Radio(s) are set to --> |manuf = <!-- Manufacturer --> |manuf_model = <!-- Manufacturer Model --> |manuf_rev = <!-- Manufacturer Revision --> |is_manuf = No |tpfirmware = Android 4.4
|availability = <!-- Market availability --> |eoldate = <!-- End of Life date --> |fccapprovdate = <!-- FCCID approval date --> |estreldate = 01/2016 |estprice = 84 |upc = 9787115284167 |ean = <!-- EAN number --> |dx_sku = <!-- DealExtreme sku --> |newegg = <!-- newegg item number --> |asin = B06XB3H7X5 |asin_country = <!-- ASIN country --> |asin2 = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country2 = <!-- ASIN country --> |countrymanuf = China
|buttons = <!-- buttons available --> |led = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |dimensions = <!-- Size of device {{convert |length|x|widthordepth|x|height|in|mm}} --> |weight = <!-- Weight of device {{convert|weight|oz|g}} -->
|wi1_if_name = |rad1mod = AMPAK AP6330 |rad1modif = SDIO (module) |rad1chip1 = Broadcom;BCM4330; |rad1chip2 = Broadcom;BCM40183; |rad1oui = <!-- Only if different from above OUI --> |rad1_ant_conn = U.FL |rad1txchains = 1 |rad1rxchains = 1 |rad1sstreams = 1 |rad1stand = IEEE 802.11a/b/g/n |rad1n = 150 |rad1g = 54 |rad1b = 11 |rad1a = 54 |rad1freq = 2.4 or 5 |rad1correv = <!-- core revision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |rad1cap = <!-- radio capabilities, Leave blank for none or unknown -->
}}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== This board is also referred to as '''Cubietruck Plus''' which is silkscreened on the PCB.
{{see also|List of Single-board computers}}
===Hardware specification=== *CPU: ''[[Allwinner]]'' H8 Octa-core Cortex-A7 *GPU: ''PowerVR'' SGX544MP1 *Memory: 2GB DDR3 @672MHz *Onboard Storage: 8GB eMMC, TF card (max. 64GB) / MMC card slot
==Links of Interest== *[http://linux-sunxi.org/Cubietech_Cubietruck_Plus ''Cubietech Cubietruck Plus'' on '''Linux-Sunxi''' Wiki] *[https://www.cnx-software.com/2015/08/03/cubieboard-5-aka-cubietruck-plus-development-board-is-powered-by-allwinner-h8-soc/ ''Cubieboard 5 (aka CubieTruck Plus) Development Board is Powered by Allwinner H8 SoC'' on '''CNXSOFT''' ] *[https://www.cnx-software.com/2015/12/28/cubietruck-plus-development-board-with-displayport-hdmi-sells-for-84-in-china/ ''CubieTruck Plus Development Board with DisplayPort & HDMI Sells for $84 (in China)'' on '''CNXSOFT''' ]
==See also== *[[Cubietech Cubietruck]] - ''Allwinner'' A20 2-cores ARM Cortex-A7 CPU @1.0GHz *[[Cubietech Cubieboard]] - ''Allwinner'' A10 1-cores ARM Cortex-A8 CPU @1.0GHz *[[Cubietech Cubieboard 2]] - ''Allwinner'' A20 2-cores ARM Cortex-A7 CPU @1.0GHz *[[Cubietech Cubieboard 3]] - ''Allwinner'' A20 2-cores ARM Cortex-A7 CPU @1.0GHz :Wi-Fi: [[Broadcom]] BCM4329, BT: [[Broadcom]] BCM40181, GbE [[Realtek]] RTL8211E *[[Cubietech Cubieboard 4]] - ''Allwinner'' A80 SoC (4-cores ARM Cortex-A15 and :4-cores ARM Cortex-A7 big.LITTLE), GPU: PowerVR G6230, Wi-Fi (2.4/5GHz) *[[Cubietech Cubieboard 5]] - ''Allwinner'' H8 8-cores ARM Cortex-A7 CPU @2.0GHz :GPU: PowerVR SGX544 @700MHz, Toshiba TC358777XBG, Wi-Fi (2.4/5GHz)
[[Category:English Documentation]]
